channel.title: Quest Cape!
channel.description:
Hello im in need of the gfx for the quest cape!
I just recently added the quest cape to my server/client But know i don't have a emote for it!
If anyone on here has the emote please can i have it :D

item.title: Quest Cape!
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

[quote=“mLexus, post:8, topic:216827”]Stop being so fucking stupid, find it yourself next time, it’s not gonna fucking work unless it’s in your client, so fuck off.[/quote]Absoloutly 100% correct… Theres a post in the tuts section… Or are you too lazy?

item.title: Quest Cape!
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("quest")) {// quest skillcape emote...
	startAnimation(1500);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
	stillgfx(643, absY, absX);
}

Theres your fucking emote noob… It wont work unless its in your client aswell…

And seeing as you flamed everyone here you can find for yourself?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 03:40:44 AM[/size][hr]Oh and you cant code so yer EPIC FAIL!

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Cape!
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

Make a graphic that isn’t like the emote on Runescape… The point of a private emulated server is that you can make it how it’s original, and Different from the real one. Avoid doing what jagex does.
